Rulings.Base:
1. If "Naturia Cliff" is equipped to a monster like "Relinquished" when it is destroyed and sent to the GY, you can activate its effect.
2. You can activate this effect during the Damage Step.
3. You can use this effect even if "Naturia Cliff" is sent from the field from the GY while equipped to a monster like "Relinquished".
4. This effect activates even when "Naturia Cliff" is destroyed while face-down and sent to the GY.
5. [FORUM] Since the effect of "Naturia Cliff" is an optional Trigger Effect, it will miss the timing if used as (includes but is not limited to):
[*]Tribute for a Tribute Summon
[*]Synchro Material for a Synchro Summon
[*]Sent to the GY as a Cost for an effect
[*]Sent to the GY during Chain link 2 or higher

PSCT.Base: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Naturia" monster from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.
